.. _plugins_in_inspur.sm:

Plugin Index
============

These are the plugins in the inspur.sm collection

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1


Module Plugins
--------------

* :ref:`ad_group <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.ad_group_module>` -- Manage active directory group information.
* :ref:`ad_group_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.ad_group_info_module>` -- Get active directory group information.
* :ref:`ad_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.ad_info_module>` -- Get active directory information.
* :ref:`adapter_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.adapter_info_module>` -- Get adapter information.

* :ref:`add_ldap_group <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.add_ldap_group_module>` -- Add ldap group information.
* :ref:`add_ldisk <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.add_ldisk_module>` -- Create logical disk.

* :ref:`add_user_group <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.add_user_group_module>` -- Create user group.
* :ref:`alert_policy_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.alert_policy_info_module>` -- Get alert policy.

* :ref:`auto_capture_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.auto_capture_info_module>` -- Get auto capture screen information.
* :ref:`backplane_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.backplane_info_module>` -- Get disk backplane information.
* :ref:`backup <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.backup_module>` -- Backup server settings.
* :ref:`bios_export <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.bios_export_module>` -- Export BIOS config.
* :ref:`bios_import <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.bios_import_module>` -- Import BIOS config.
* :ref:`bios_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.bios_info_module>` -- Get BIOS setup.
* :ref:`bmc_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.bmc_info_module>` -- Get BMC information.
* :ref:`boot_image_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.boot_image_info_module>` -- Get bmc boot image information.
* :ref:`boot_option_info <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.boot_option_info_module>` -- Get BIOS boot options.

* :ref:`clear_system_log <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.clear_system_log_module>` -- Clear BMC system log.

* :ref:`collect_log <ansible_collections.inspur.sm.collect_log_module>` -- Collect logs.
